description: An inspiring magician whose power echoes the music of creation
tool_proficiencies: Three musical instruments of your choice
starting_equipment: Rapier or longsword or simple weapon

level_1_features.name: Spellcasting
level_1_features.description: You know 2 cantrips and 4 spells from the bard spell list. Charisma is your spellcasting ability

level_1_features.name: Bardic Inspiration
level_1_features.description: Grant an ally a d6 to add to an ability check, attack roll, or saving throw (Charisma modifier times per long rest)
